XII.ii.2.C.1.d
.
Completing VA Form 21P-4180
Use the table below for instructions on how to complete the items on
VA Form 21P-4180
, Part I.
Item
Description
1, 5, and 6
Provide the Veteran’s
full name
date of birth, and
date of death.
Note
:  This information is of particular importance for SSA purposes when the Social Security number (SSN) is unknown or not correct.
2
Provide the complete address of the regional office (RO) submitting the form.
Note
:  Since SSA returns these forms in a window envelope, write the address so that the complete address can be seen in the window.
3
Enter the VA claim number.
4
Enter either
the Veteran’s SSN, if known, or
Unknown
.
7
List the following claimants, as applicable:
the surviving spouse
all children under age 18 or children incapable of self-support, and
parents.
Important
:
It is necessary to list
all
the possible claimants whether a claim has been filed, such as
surviving spouse
children, and
parents.
When parents are listed, make a notation as to whether they have filed a claim for VA benefits.
8
Obtain the signature of the Veterans Service Center Manager.
14
Enter the appropriate SSA PSC as described in
M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, 2.C.1.e
.
